Html: Hi ,is it some paper available about algorithms?

Hi,
 Did you try 1.7 SDK and 1.7.1 Toolkit. You should check out Interaction gallery in 1.7.1 Toolkit.
With 1.7 We detect, Open hand, Close hand, Press controls. Please checkout 1.7 SDK/toolkit and let us know if that is what you are looking for.

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/kinectforwindows/develop/developer-downloads.aspx

hi , i am really sorry for inaccurate thread topic ,yea, i allready checked toolkit and examples there.
My question about computer vision and machine learning algorithms behind grisp\press detection.
and i suppose that is not right place for such questions,is it?

I don't think, this might be right resource for answering computer vision and machine learning algos sources.
Our team has provided a solution for Press, Grip and Release. We like to know, if this solution is what you are looking for. If not, What problem you are trying to solve.
